basics.name: Gehad Mostafa
basics.summary: Master’s student in quantum technologies with research experience in quantum key distribution, quantum metrology, and topological condensed matter systems. Background in both theoretical and experimental physics, with interests in quantum communications, quantum sensing, and science communication.

research experience.organization: Max Planck Institute for the Physics of Complex Systems

Reviewed entanglement-based QKD protocols, scalability challenges, and early implementations in operational networks and satellite-based quantum communication.
Series of experimental investigations in physics.
